When Shingen dies, his generals reluctantly agree to have the impostor take over as the powerful ruler. He soon begins to appreciate life as Shingen, but his commitment to the role is tested when he must lead his troops into battle against the forces of a rival warlord.","popularity":24.36,"poster_path":"/ag3sgXg27j8NTaIbWoODIFiikfw.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":882,"logo_path":"/iDw9Xxok1d9WAM2zFicI8p3khTH.png","name":"TOHO","origin_country":"JP"},{"id":25,"logo_path":"/qZCc1lty5FzX30aOCVRBLzaVmcp.png","name":"20th Century Fox","origin_country":"US"},{"id":2680,"logo_path":null,"name":"Kurosawa Production","origin_country":"JP"},{"id":70,"logo_path":"/ueaENQkPcy8rlr5fGZVBXKOhlBh.png","name":"American Zoetrope","origin_country":"US"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"JP","name":"Japan"},{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"1980-04-26","revenue":4000000,"runtime":180,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"Japanese","iso_639_1":"ja","name":"日本語"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"The Shadow of a man can never stand up and walk on its own","title":"Kagemusha","video":false,"vote_average":7.815,"vote_count":626}
